Field Detail

TITLE_KEY_PREFIX

public static final java.lang.String TITLE_KEY_PREFIX
Value of prefix for title key to be resolved to a localized view title. The suffix of the title key is the generated from view name, with slash characters replaced by '.'. For example, view name "account/show" is mapped to key "view.title.account.show", that in turn could be resolved to "Account Details".

See Also:
Constant Field Values

VIEW_URL_ATTR

public static final java.lang.String VIEW_URL_ATTR
Name of request-scoped attribute used to save resource URL this view. Should match the variable name used in template view in includes, such as: 
<jsp:include page=${viewUtl} />

See Also:
Constant Field Values

VIEW_NAME_ATTR

public static final java.lang.String VIEW_NAME_ATTR
Name of request-scoped attribute used to save name of this view.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TITLE_ATTR

public static final java.lang.String TITLE_ATTR
Name of request-scoped attribute used to save this view title key.

useTemplate

protected boolean useTemplate(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Check if the view should be decorated.

Parameters:
request - the HttpServletRequest
Returns:
true, if the view should be decorated; false, otherwise.

selectTemplate

protected java.lang.String selectTemplate(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Select template to decorate view for the request. Algorithm is as follow: 1) if request parameter {#layoutParam} is specified: 1.1) if value is equals to no decoration is performed. 1.2) otherwise, the value of the parameter is taken as a template name 2) otherwise, the value of property {#templatePath} is used

Parameters:
request - the HttpServletRequest
Returns:
the template path to use for decoration of the view for this request; or null, if no decoration should be performed.

getTitleKey

protected java.lang.String getTitleKey(java.lang.String viewName)
Get the message key to use for the title of a view. In current implementation, for a view named "account/view" the title key "view.title.account.view" is returned.

Parameters:
viewName - the unprocessed view name String as returned by controller
Returns:
the title message key

preprocessViewName

protected java.lang.String preprocessViewName(java.lang.String viewName)
Extract view name from String value returned by web controller handler method.

Parameters:
viewName - the unprocessed view name String as returned by controller
Returns:
the processed view name.
